scripts._dev: concurrently "npm run build-watch" "npm run build-test-watch" "npm run test-watch"
scripts.dev2: concurrently "npm run build-watch" "npm run build-test-watch" "npm run test-watch-headful"
scripts.test: npm run build-test && npx playwright test
scripts.test-with-coverage: npm run build-test && npx playwright test && npm run print-coverage && npm run clean-coverage
scripts.linux-run-playwright: xhost +local:docker && docker run -it --name playwright -e DISPLAY=$DISPLAY -v /tmp/.X11-unix:/tmp/.X11-unix:rw --network=host --ipc=host --shm-size=2gb --rm mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.55.1-noble npx npx -y playwright@1.55.1 run-server --port 8010 --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.linux-test-watch-headful: nodemon --watch build --exec "PW_TEST_CONNECT_WS_ENDPOINT=ws://127.0.0.1:8010/ npx playwright test -c playwright.linux.config.ts"
scripts.test-extension: npm run build-extension-test && npx playwright test -c playwright.extension.config.ts
